versions.localizedDescription:
# TrollApps 2.1 is complete!
## Features and Improvements
1. Repos are now alphabetically sorted to make it easier to find apps.
2. Added the option to update TrollStore-installed apps directly within the application.
3. Added the ability to update TrollApps in-app by adding the Resonance Team repository.
4. When selecting older app versions they will show up as ""OLDER"" rather then ""OPEN""
5. Enhanced error handling and explanations for app installation failures.
6. Changed the style of repository and app lists to better use space.
7. Relocated the ""All Apps"" list to a more intuitive space.
8. Changed the search bar for iOS 15+ to use the apple inbuilt version, and created a similar version for iOS 14 users.
9. Updated the style of the GET/OPEN/OLDER buttons in the app details view to match the AppStore's style.
10. Implemented the ability to download apps directly from repository lists without needing to view the app details first.
## Performance and Fixes
1. Addressed reported bugs from version 2.0
2. Resolved an issue where in certain cases you could not select apps in the edit mode (they'd be auto un-selected)
3. Updated the Sources navbar icon, resolving compatibility issues on iOS 14.
## Miscellaneous
- Introduced general app speed improvements.
- Various minor tweaks and adjustments for an overall better user experience.
